overview: After Say Sorry was formed in mid-2011, a band who brought the genre that is quite different from that never existed, and here’s After Say Sorry formation itself. Adit (Scream / Growl), Cesar (Guitar), Ricky (Guitar), and Memet (Bass). The band itself is not a new band, because originally the band’s own combination of two bands Blaze Of Your Head who is familiarly called the Boy-head with the Summer Death Season. At the time it’s Personnel Boy-head had difficulty in finding a vocalist, until finally Adit, former vocalist of Summer Death Season offers to go to Boy-head itself, because the personnel Summer Death Season wish to continue college studies. After Adit entrance so we decided to change the name of our band, be After Say Sorry, with Additional drummer named Jack, and the two Additional Synth / Keys named Mohd Kadavi and Dawil Kirami For now we will still carry the color of new music, different. but the elements “Metal, Post Hardcore, Screamo, Punk, Trance remain the hallmark of its own.
